content.p: The Executive Education arm of Nottingham University Business School (NUBS) Malaysia works with organisations to motivate, retain and develop their human capital in a changing economic environment, and through these working relationships, the School aspires to be industry-relevant with a sound understanding of the industry requirements of graduates today. The Executive Education Arm also organises the NUBS Malaysia Masterclass Series, which provides a platform to connect the university community, alumni and industry partners in engaging sessions with thought leaders on contemporary business ideas and challenges. NUBS Malaysia Executive Education delivers via a proven mixed approach that covers both theoretical and applied aspects of the subject-matter concerned. Our executive education programmes employ various methods of learning: If you have an enquiry about NUBS Malaysia's executive education programmes, please contact a member of the Executive Education team. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
